OrgName: Alliance Data FHC, Inc., trading as Epsilon International
activities: Alliance Data FHC, Inc. (Epsilon) works with marketers (clients) in various industries, including retail, pharmaceutical, and financial services. Epsilon assists its clients by developing direct mail marketing communications to send their customers (client's customers/consumers). Epsilon's leading email technology helps drive marketers and communicators forward by leveraging strategic, ROI-focused email communications. Epsilon is dedicated to building permission-based, long-term, profitable relationships through relevant email communications and proven retention, loyalty and lifetime customer value methodologies, such as hosting the actual collection site, delivering email, tracking results and analyzing data. Epsilon also creates database technology solutions for the management of customer data for its clients to support their online and offline direct marketing and email marketing efforts.
